mapper.select: /* Adbrix.xml - getMakeAdbrixData */ select mem_no ,mem_sex as sex -- ,FLOOR( (CAST(REPLACE(date(NOW()),'-','') AS UNSIGNED) - CAST(REPLACE( date(STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(a.mem_birth_year,'-',mem_birth_month,'-',mem_birth_day), '%Y-%m-%d' )),'-','') AS UNSIGNED)) / 10000 ) as realAge ,concat(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-a.mem_birth_year + 1,'') as age ,(select last_upd_date from rd_data.tb_member_connect_log where mem_no = a.mem_no order by last_upd_date desc limit 1) as connectTime ,(select count(*) from rd_data.tb_member_connect_log where mem_no = a.mem_no) as connectCnt , 'N' broadcastCreateYn , 'N' broadcastJoinYn , 'N' payYn -- ,(select if(count(*) > 0,'y','n') from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room where mem_no = a.mem_no and state != 4) as broadcastCreateYn -- ,(select if(count(*) > 0,'y','n') from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member where mem_no = a.mem_no and state=0 and auth != 3) as broadcastJoinYn -- ,(select ifnull(pay_yn,'n') from rd_data.tb_payment_succ where mem_no = a.mem_no) as payYn From rd_data.tb_member_basic a where a.mem_no=#{memNo}
